sathunge shwasana wyuha (kruminge shwasanala paddhathiya ha asthika mathsyayange jalakloma wala wyuhaya awashya natha ) dehawaranaya shwasanala penahali minisage shwasana paddhathiye wyuha ehi kruthya walata dakwana sambandhatha anawaranaya karayi minisage shwasana paddhathiye dala wyuhaya penahali wathanaya kirime yanthranaya shwasana chakraya ha shwasana wayu parima rudhiraya ha wathaya athara wayu huwamaruwa rudhiraya ha pataka athara wayu huwamaruwa minisage shwasana yamanaya shwasana paddhathiya aashritha rogabadha dum bima shwasana paddhathiya kerehi athi kerena balapama duwili shwasana paddhathiya kerehi athi kerena balapama silika ha asbastos anshu walata nirawaranaya wimen athi wana wruththimaya aabadha aakruthi ha rupa satahan bhawithayen minis shwasana paddhathiya adhyanaya kirima ha wyayama magin shwasana wegaya ha nadi wegayata athi balapama nirikshanaya kirima . 6 eekakaya - pariwahanaya jiwin thula sidu wana drawya pariwahanaya ha sambandha kriyawali wimasa balayi.

oba ape piyawarun, obage senanga lesa thoragena, owun shuddhawantha kala seka. 26 obage siyalu senanga wana ishrayel janathawa wenuwen me puda pandura piligena obe urumaya aaraksha kota eya kapa karana sek wa! 27 apa atharin thawamath wisira sitina aya ekthan kota wijathin athara wahalkame sitina aya nidahas kara awamanayata ha pilikulata pathra wu aya desa obage karuna balma hela oba apage dewiyan wahanse bawa wijathikayanta danagannata salaswana sek wa! 28 udangukama nisa apata pida kota apata ninda karana ayata oba wahanse danduwam karana sek wa! 29 moses porondu wu lesa obage shuddhasthanayehi obe senanga sthira wa ma pihituwana sek wa!’ 30 ”inpasu pujakawaru githika gayana kalaha. 31 puda pujawa mulumanin ma dawi giya pasu, wishala gal matha, ithiri wu diyara wath kirimata nehemiya ana kele ya. 32 meya kala wita gini daluwak hatagaththe ya.
jiwana wiyadama ihala yama nisa nagara badawa menma gambadawada duppath ha madhyama panthika janayage thaththwaya rata birathanya yatath wijithayakwa pawathi kalayatath wada anthaya.

ee kese wethath honda dimanawak labagena kumana ho jarnalayaka thama paryeshana pathrikawak pala kara ganime nothith ashawak atham paryeshakayinta athiwak men, diwa ra me kalapuwa thula wehesena masun marannanta menma watapitawa gana haba aadarayak athi minisunta thama wesena parisaraye siduwana de gana dana ganimata ahinsaka ashawak menma ayithiwasikamak athi bawada apa wisin mehidi amathaka nokala yuthuya.
winodathmaka madhyayak lesa mulinma sinamawa paminiyada, eyin labana danuma, ho aadarshayan kese wethath thawamath eya salakanuye winodamadhyayak lesatamaya.

siwadasan - api okkoma rajawaru , sunil somapiris - mata thama mathakayi chithrapatawala adhyakshakawaru ma kerehi thibunu wishwasaya nisa mata pradhana charitha rangapame awasthawa laba dunna.mita amatharawa chithrapata bohomayakata ranganayen dayaka wuna.wedikawen piwisenne chithrapata kshethrayata,warthamanaye telinatya bohomayakata ranganayen dayaka wi sitina obe arambhaya sihikaloth?kopi kade teli natyayen arambai mama wikashaya wunu nisala diya sasala wiya, thamara arana, batti,ihiruna kiri, natyawala rangapawa.danata telikas wena sandasawi,sirige iranama, teli natya sandaha dayaka wuna.idiriyata wikashaya wennata teli natya kihipayak thibenawa.me dinawala korale mahaththaya 3 rangapame nirathawa sitinawa.eda ,ada me wasara 20 purawata kapila oba aa gamana pilibandawa sahimakata pathwenawada?aththenma ow.mama aawe boho dushkara gamanak,mage kapawima,nopasu basna uthsahaya,prawinayanta garu kirima,methek aa badhakayanta dhairya sampannawa nopakiliwa muhuna dima,charithayanta uparima sadaranayak kirima nisa eka charithayakata kotunowi methek kal me kshethraye radi sitime hakiyawa thibuna kiwwoth niwaradiyi.methek kala charitha atharin sith gath charitha ha amathaka nowana siduwim gana kiwwoth?hama charithayakatama kamathiyi.ee atharin thamara arane sumeda hamuduruwo,sepalika eke akman mama ,korale mahaththaya teliye pabalis ta wadath priya karanawa.thamara arana ru gatha kale aluthgama kande wiharaya paththe thiyena purana wiharayaka ,mage awasthawa enakan putuwakata wela innakota wandana nadayak aawa.
punchi duwage rangapam dakkata passe, gedara aya, yaluwo ehema mokada kiwwe?
